frame.name: Spinning Money
frame.subtitle: Connect and Spin Win
frame.description: Spin the wheel and win ETH! Provably fair crypto gaming on Base. Every spin grows the prize pool - the more you play, the bigger the jackpot gets! All spins contribute to the pool and YOU could be the next big winner!
frame.ogDescription: Spin for big jackpot prizes. Remember, every spin makes a difference between your total prize pool.
